findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The authorized modifier is used in multiple functions, which may allow an unauthorized user to upgrade scripts.
findings.function: setIsDividendExempt, enable_blacklist, manage_blacklist, setIsFeeExempt, setIsTxLimitExempt, setIsTimelockExempt, setFees, setFeeReceivers, setSwapBackSettings, setTargetLiquidity, setDistributionCriteria, setDistributorSettings

findings.title: Unprotected external function calls
findings.description: External functions setIsDividendExempt, setIsFeeExempt, setIsTxLimitExempt, setIsTimelockExempt, setFees, setFeeReceivers, setSwapBackSettings, setTargetLiquidity, and setDistributionCriteria do not have sufficient access control.

findings.title: Lack of access control in functions
findings.description: Multiple functions lack access control, allowing unauthorized users to interact with them.

findings.title: Unsecured token transfer and approval
findings.description: The smart contract allows unsecured token transfer and approval, potentially leading to unauthorized transactions.

findings.title: Unprotected internal function calls
findings.description: The smart contract contains unprotected internal function calls which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unvalidated user input
findings.description: The smart contract does not validate user-provided inputs, which can lead to unexpected behavior and potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Insecure use of authorized/onlyOwner roles
findings.description: Multiple functions have insecure use of authorized and onlyOwner roles, allowing unauthorized access and manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected swap and liquidity functions
findings.description: The swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens, and swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens functions are unprotected, allowing unauthorized access to the liquidity functions.

findings.title: Insecure dividend distribution and processing
findings.description: The distributeDividend function has insecure dividend distribution and processing.
